vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐκνήφω,
future -ψω[LXX]:—sleep off a drunken fit, become sober again, [same place], Hippoloch. cited in [NT+1st c.AD+]: with genitive, recover from, χάρμῃ ἐ. τῆς δυσθυμίης [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II transitive, carry off, ἀρρώστημα ἐκνήψει ὕπνος [LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to come to one’s sense, become sober wake
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to come to one’s sense, become sober wake
primarily to awake sober after intoxication; metaphorically to shake off mental bewilderment, to wake up from delusion and folly, 1Cor. 15:34*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 酒醒, 不再喝酒
2) 覺醒 (林前15:34)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 酒醒, 不再喝酒
2) 觉醒 (林前15:34)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: tỉnh biết; trở lại lối suy nghĩ chính đáng. ἐκ (G1537) + νήφω (G3525)
